comment: If a nonzero integer ` M ` divides another integer ` N ` , the other integer ` N ` divided by the nonzero integer ` M ` (i.e. the _divisor conjugate_ of ` N ` to ` M ` ) divides the other integer ` N ` . Theorem 1.1(k) in [ApostolNT] p. 14. (Contributed by AV, 7-Aug-2021.)
